TextView.android:text: Super Street Fighter IV is a fighting game produced by Capcom. It features 3D backgrounds and characters played on a 2D plane. It has been an all-time favourite in the world for arcade fighting and this is the first time that it will be introduced in Tathva.\n\nNew and experienced players can fight it out as it is extremely easy to learn but one of the most difficult games to master. Come fight it out in the Blitzkrieg Arena and prove that you are the best Street Fighter!

1. Registration: Rs. 50/- per participant. Tathva registration is compulsory.
2. Round 1 will be ad-hoc and anyone can participate by registering at any time. If you win in Round 1, you get the entry fees of Rs.50/- back and proceed to the main tournament. The main tournament will continue on a knockout basis with people being called by phone and as per availability of game system.
3. Games/Matches will be stopped when win condition is achieved.
4. Entry Stage and Tournament Stage:
 a. Rounds per match: 5
 b. Matches: 1
 c. Time Per Round: 99s
5. Semi-Finals and Finals:
 a. Rounds per match: 5
 b. Matches: 3
 c. Time Per Round: 99s
6. All characters allowed (including unlocked).
7. Systems and controllers will be provided.
8. You may get your own controllers but they must be compatible with the game. If they do not work on a plug-and-play basis, they will not be entertained.
9. Any damage to the controllers/systems will be fined as such.
10. In case of a draw, a 3 round match will be held to decide the victor.
11. The matches may be broadcasted on a projector.
12. People are expected to maintain their calm and not take out any frustration on the people and equipment.
13. You will be informed of the game at least 30 min before game-time (for round2 onwards).If the time is not feasible, it will be rescheduled as per mutual agreement of both players if possible. If you cannot turn up at the venue by the scheduled time, the event-manager may disqualify you based on his decision.
14. The manager's decision will be final. Rules or structure may be modified at any time.
